## Description {#details}

Template specialization to give <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdater">SSAUpdater</a> access to CFG and value information.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdater">SSAUpdater</a> calls methods in these traits, passing in the LDVSSAUpdater object, to learn about blocks and the values they define. It also provides methods to create PHI nodes and track them.

Definition at line 4016 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/livedebugvalues/instrrefbasedimpl-cpp">InstrRefBasedImpl.cpp</a>.

### CreateEmptyPHI() {#a1ba7a4f9025c38ba1d2d612e49551dcb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static BlockValueNum llvm::SSAUpdaterTraits&lt; LDVSSAUpdater &gt;::CreateEmptyPHI (LDVSSABlock &#42; BB, unsigned NumPreds, LDVSSAUpdater &#42; Updater)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
CreateEmptyPHI - Create a (representation of a) PHI in the given block.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdater">SSAUpdater</a> will populate it with information about incoming values. The value number of this PHI is whatever the machine value number problem solution determined it to be. This includes non-phi values if <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdater">SSAUpdater</a> tries to create a PHI where the incoming values are identical.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/livedebugvalues/instrrefbasedimpl-cpp/#l04082">4082</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/livedebugvalues/instrrefbasedimpl-cpp">InstrRefBasedImpl.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

GetPoisonVal - Normally creates an IMPLICIT&#95;DEF instruction with a new register.

For <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/livedebugvalues">LiveDebugValues</a>, represents a block identified as not having any DBG&#95;PHI predecessors.
